kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

test.name: Verifying links in target home page

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` exactly contains text `expected`.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'jquery=#UserMenu' contains exactly text 'sign in / account'.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` contains text `expected`.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'jquery=#ShopNavMenu > li:nth-child(1) #mystoreText' contains text 'my store'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` exactly contains text `expected`.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'jquery=#ShopNavMenu > li:nth-child(2) a' contains exactly text 'weekly ad'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` exactly contains text `expected`.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'jquery=#ShopNavMenu > li:nth-child(3) a' contains exactly text 'gift cards'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` exactly contains text `expected`.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'jquery=#ShopNavMenu > li:nth-child(4) a' contains exactly text 'lists / registries'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` exactly contains text `expected`.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'jquery=#ShopNavMenu > li:nth-child(5) a' contains exactly text 'REDcard'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
